# Sperax MCP Server

> Model Context Protocol server for the Sperax DeFi ecosystem - enabling AI agents to interact with USDs (auto-yield stablecoin), SPA governance, veSPA staking, Demeter yield farms, and the complete Sperax protocol on Arbitrum and BNB Chain.

## Quick Facts
- **Tools**: 85 callable functions across 16 categories
- **Resources**: 11 documentation endpoints
- **Prompts**: 19 pre-built conversation templates
- **Networks**: Arbitrum One, BNB Chain
- **Transport**: stdio (Claude Desktop) or HTTP/SSE

## Installation
```bash
npx -y @sperax/mcp-server
```

## Claude Desktop Config
```json
{
  "mcpServers": {
    "sperax": {
      "command": "npx",
      "args": ["-y", "@sperax/mcp-server"]
    }
  }
}
```

## Core Capabilities

### USDs Stablecoin (7 tools)
- `usds_get_info` - Token overview, supply, APR
- `usds_get_balance` - Check balance and rebase state
- `usds_get_yield_info` - Current yield metrics
- `usds_estimate_mint` - Simulate minting

### Vault & Collateral (10 tools)
- `vault_get_status` - TVL, health, utilization
- `vault_get_collaterals` - Supported collaterals
- `vault_get_strategies` - Active yield strategies

### SPA & Staking (8 tools)
- `spa_get_info` - Token overview
- `vespa_get_position` - Lock position and voting power
- `vespa_calculate_power` - Calculate voting power

### Demeter Farms (7 tools)
- `demeter_list_farms` - All active farms
- `demeter_get_top_farms` - Highest APR farms
- `demeter_get_user_position` - User farm positions

### Analytics (6 tools)
- `analytics_get_tvl` - TVL breakdown
- `analytics_get_protocol_health` - Health score

### Governance (5 tools)
- `governance_get_proposals` - Active proposals
- `governance_get_voting_power` - User voting power

### Oracle (5 tools)
- `oracle_get_all_prices` - Chainlink prices
- `oracle_check_staleness` - Data freshness

### Plus: Dripper (5), Yield Reserve (4), Portfolio (2), Subgraph (5), Supply (3), Swap (3), Agents (5), Plugins (6), News (7)

## Key Protocol Concepts

- **USDs**: Auto-yield stablecoin, ~5% APY via daily rebase, no claiming required
- **SPA**: Governance token, 30% of yield used for buyback & burn
- **veSPA**: Vote-escrowed SPA, lock 7 days to 4 years, voting power = SPA Ã— (days/365)
- **xSPA**: Reward token, redeem for SPA with 15-180 day vesting (50-100%)
- **Demeter**: No-code yield farm creation, 100 USDs fee
